name: PopClip to Anki
description: Send selected text to Anki via AnkiConnect.

options.label: Deck Name
options.description: Target Anki deck for new notes.

options.label: Note Type
options.description: Anki note type (model) to use when creating notes.

options.label: Front Field
options.description: Field of the note that receives the selected text.

options.label: Back Field
options.description: Field that receives the generated back content.

options.label: Back Template
options.description: Template for the back field. Use {selection} for the selected text and {source} for the detected source URL or app name.

options.label: Tags
options.description: Space separated list of tags to add to created notes.

options.label: Allow Duplicates
options.description: Allow creating duplicate notes within the deck.
